formatted_address: 17A,Jalan Niaga Aspira 1/1, Gerbang Nusajaya, Upstairs 7-11, Kampung Tiram, 79200 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Nailflix Studio

reviews.text: Recently I  visited this new shop and had a fantastic experience! Aside from their manicure and pedicure services, they also offer amazing facials. I tried the Oxycell Timeless System facial and their acne treatment, and my skin feels so much clearer and refreshed. They use a brand called Quarz, and it really worked wonders for my skin. The staff were super friendly and the prices are reasonable. If you’re looking for a one-stop shop for nails and skincare, definitely give this shop a try.

If you’re in the mood for some pampering, you should definitely check out this newly opened shop! The moment you walk in, the ambiance is inviting, and the staff makes you feel right at home. I was impressed by their professionalism and the extensive selection of nail colors. My manicure was flawless, with amazing attention to detail. It's a perfect spot to unwind and treat yourself. I can’t wait to return and try out more of their services!

Finally I found a convenient, very pleasant and professional service from Nailflix studio. For the first time, I'm fully satisfied with their service.
Very nice atmosphere, clean and relaxation place.
First try for the oxycell timeless, it's amazing..I'm very happy with the result. My skin look growing and radiance even just a first trial treatment.
And I highly recommend Ms Hazel, she is a very nice, soft spoken, expert and give accurate advice regarding the facial treatment.
My mum very enjoy with the foot spa pedicure, and she satisfied with the nail design who suggest by Ms Cindy. Great job!! 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻
👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻, will come again for sure 😁

vicinity: Gerbang Nusajaya, 17A,Jalan Niaga Aspira 1/1, Upstairs 7-11, Iskandar Puteri
